mean_cn: adj. 入迷的，昏头昏脑的
mean_en: filled with foolish or very strong love or admiration
word_etyma: infatuat使...冲昏头脑 + ed形容词后缀 → infatuated 昏头昏脑的，入迷的
short_phrase: He is infatuated with his girlfriend.
sentence: The couple are really infatuated with each other. I hope they get married someday.
sentence_trans: 这对情侣非常为对方着迷，我希望他们有一天能结婚。
